title: Google checks in on Moto's RAZR ambitions
description: Adam, Jonathan, and Joe talk mostly Moto RAZR, Motorola’s folding phone and it’s pretty awesome. We also geek out over retro mode on the phone. Also, we take a look at Apple’s comments about Chromebooks in the classroom and Google’s checking account. What do those things have to do with each other? And finally, for App Matters, Joe walks us through Disney+, its struggles at launch and its overall value. All that and more on the Android Authority Podcast! Podcast Pick: Mixcder E7 Active Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast. Recorded November 14, 2019 This podcast is sponsored by MNML Cases. Order a sweet, thin case for your phone and get 25% off. Use code AAPodcast at checkout or click this link.https://mnmlcase.com/discount/aapodcast Topics Housekeeping Think you can sing Freddie Mercury vocals? Google AI will stop you now How to enable RCS messaging on your phone Top Story Motorola Razr hands-on: Back in black Moto RAZR Retro Mode Other stories of the week Opinion: Apple’s Phil Schiller dissing the success of Chromebooks is peak Apple A Google checking account? It’s likely coming in 2020, so get ready. App Matters Disney+ Disney Plus is now live: Everything you need to know Disney Plus issues encountered by many users on launch day Disney Plus has a lot of great content, but these issues need to be fixed Disney Plus had many launch day issues, and now we know why The Android Authority podcast is: Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy Produced by Adam Doud Check out the other podcasts in our network! html:
Nov 16, 2019

Adam, Jonathan, and Joe talk mostly Moto RAZR, Motorola’s folding phone and it’s pretty awesome. We also geek out over retro mode on the phone. Also, we take a look at Apple’s comments about Chromebooks in the classroom and Google’s checking account. What do those things have to do with each other? And finally, for App Matters, Joe walks us through Disney+, its struggles at launch and its overall value. All that and more on the Android Authority Podcast!

Podcast Pick: Mixcder E7 Active Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones

Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks

Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast.
